title: Ticket #685: Modify Windows installer with HDFS options
description: With the addition of HDFS support in Condor, the Windows installer now needs to be able to allow users to decide whether they want to use the service. It should also allow users to specify certain parameters, such as mode of operation, location of hadoop's storage, and ports to be used. The installer must then be able to modify the configuration file to correctly set up these parameters.
